top.Name: Diamond
top.Description: Diamond is definitely full of attitude. She will tell you what she wants, when she wants it, and you won’t be able to say no.

top.Name: Ego
top.Description: My mom tells me I have the perfect structure and composition – I will grow up to be a perfect stud muffin. My blue eyes are just a bonus.

bottom.Name: Electra
bottom.Description: I'm extremely sweet and easily adjustable to new situations and environments.
